Reviews.Title: This is an unbelieveable deal!!
Reviews.Author: Debra Dilallo
Reviews.Content: I bought the Nikon 3200 at Best Buy, which I was told was comparable to this one, but that one had more megapixels & was $150.00 less than this was (at Best Buy). I didn't like the quality of the photos of the Nikon & the battery died after one day so I returned it & got this on Amazon. LOOOOOOOOVE IT!!!!!!!!I am amazed at the amount of accessories that comes with this package-if you bought them at a store individually, the whole package would be at least 2 times the cost as it is here.This is an AWESOME deal. Also, the quality of the pictures is much better w/this camera. The up-close detail you can get with this camera (even w/o the zoom lens) is unbelievable. The colors are beautiful,  it's easy to use. I LOVE IT! . I cant say enough good things about it. Would definitely reccomend it.

Reviews.Title: Cool stuff
Reviews.Author: CcGG
Reviews.Content: I love the camera and it shipped really fast the lenses are fantastic and it smells nice. The tripod is pretty flimsy but that's no huge deal

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera!
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Martins
Reviews.Content: I am no professional photographer, but talking to one, he suggested this camera; At first I was a bit scared, far too many resources, but when you lay your hands on that beauty, it's love at first touch. I am still learning but I garanty it's not that hard.Great package deal, with high quality products.

Reviews.Title: I'm overwhelm with the purchase
Reviews.Author: carlos
Reviews.Content: This is more than I expected, somehow I thought the bag and tripod where going to be too small for the camera, but everything is perfect and the camera is what I had dreamed a camera should be.
